summary:
Think... No more Perks, Think... No more Spam gameplay, Think Of a Story Worthy Of Skyrim;
The Console.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
    Think... No more Perks, Think... No more Spam gameplay, Think Of a Story Worthy Of Skyrim;
         The Console[/center]
There Are Two Descriptions - The Short And Simple and the Long and Complex.

but If you want to completely understand this mod just play Skyrim with It and Try Stuff out :)[b]
[/b]
[u][b]Not Really a Description, Description:[/b][/u]
In one word The Console Recreates, For Good or for bad , Skyrim's Main features To make skyrim a more inserting place

[b][u]Short description:
[/u][/b]The Console Recreates Skyrim so that it does not heavily rely on perks, Spamming spells or crafting spam, while adding a more in-depth  story which includes more of skyrims past and mysteries.This mod will Also try to link in the story with the quest lines e.g.the Thieves Guild
making the story flow a little bit better too.[b] [u] [/u][/b]



[u][b]Long description:[/b][/u]
This Description has spoilers this is just a warning but it may be better if you play with the mod first then if go "what?" read this description

1)The new Experience(yes Not Perk!) system
2)New Gameplay relating to the Experience System[color=#ff0000][color=#f4f4f4]
3)The new Story- A taster [/color][/color]
author: Ethan Riley
